title: Secret Agent Christmas Game
content:
My brother spend a lot of time this year with my tools to create a Christmas present for you! It's a graphics modification for [url=http://www.3drealms.com/agent/index.html]Secret Agent[/url].

In [url=http://www.student.tue.nl/u/a.f.smeijers/sfp/games/secretagent.htm#mod]Secret Agent: License to Chill[/url] you are Agent 006. He gets to dress up like Santa Claus, throw snowballs at Christmas elves and robots, collect an array of weapons, and settle the score with his archenemy Dr. No Body!

[img]http://www.student.tue.nl/u/a.f.smeijers/sfp/pic/samxmas2.png[/img]

Download Secret Agent: License to Chill from the [url=http://www.student.tue.nl/u/a.f.smeijers/sfp/default.htm]S&F Prod. Homepage[/url]!Groeten van Frenkel
Visit [url=http://www.sfprod.cjb.net]The Official S&F Prod. Homepage[/url]
